title: Selamat Tahun Baru Imlek!
subtitle: Happy Chinese New Year!
description: Learn basic facts about Indonesian, numbers, introductions, and Chinese New Year vocabulary.

title: Di Kampung dan Di Kota
subtitle: In the Country and the City
description: Talk about school, friends, and daily life. Learn 'ber-' verbs and possessive '-nya'.

title: Hari Nyepi di Bali
subtitle: The Balinese Day of Silence
description: Travel to Bali, learn about Hindu culture, giving directions, and 'meN-' verbs.

title: Hari Kartini
subtitle: Kartini Day
description: Learn about Kartini, family descriptions, weddings, telling time, and passive di- verbs.

title: Waisak di Yogya
subtitle: Waisak in Jogja
description: Trip to Yogyakarta, tenses, telling time with fractions, occupations, and directions.

title: Hore, Liburan Sekolah!
subtitle: Hooray! It's School Holidays!
description: Sports and art week, school reports, hobbies, favorite things, colors, seasons, and cinema.

title: Ramadhan dan Idul Fitri
subtitle: Fasting Month and Eid-Ul-Fitr
description: Ramadan customs, ter- prefix, food vocabulary, mengapa/karena, and mudik tradition.

title: Idul Adha di Sumatera Barat
subtitle: Idul Adha in West Sumatra
description: Padang food, Idul Adha, counters (sebuah, seorang, seekor), imperative verbs, and -an suffix.

title: Merdeka!
subtitle: Independence!
description: Indonesian independence, Sukarno, bukan vs tidak, weather vocabulary, and prepositions.

title: Satu Nusa, Satu Bangsa, Satu Bahasa
subtitle: One Island, One Nation, One Language
description: Youth Pledge, sangat/sekali intensifiers, gado-gado recipe, and the -kan verb suffix.

title: Ayo, Bung!
subtitle: Let's Go, Bro!
description: Surabaya city parks, Battle of Surabaya, ke-an nouns, mohon requests, and Indonesian proverbs.

title: Selamat Natal dan Tahun Baru
subtitle: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year
description: Christmas cards, bahwa conjunction, telephone conversations, identity cards, and eastern Indonesia traditions.
